title: russell+hazel Acrylic Bloc Wide Accessory Tray, Clear, 7.18” x 12.2” x .5” (31383)
features: Accessorize your desk; pristine acrylic tray subtly organizes and displays common desktop items, such as mail, staplers and tape dispensers
Desktop organization elevated; fashion and function converge in a distinctive yet unassuming design that will elevate your workspace
Where style meets substance; crisp modern design realized with flawless, polished edge construction
Modest design with robust utility; keep accessories, amenities, and other desktop objects organized in style in this 7.18” x 12.2” x .5” clear acrylic tray
Expanding to meet your needs; enjoy the simplicity of our catchall tray, or use in conjunction with our Stackable Bloc line of acrylic desk accessories
description: Demonstrate your care for the details with our acrylic bloc tray, a 7.18” x 12.2” x .5” desktop container. Sleek utility and a chic modern design elevates your desk while accommodating desktop items. Durably constructed from hard cast acrylic with finely polished edges. Simply perfect on its own, this accessory tray integrates with the other pieces in our Stackable Bloc collection, including our acrylic inbox, acrylic pencil bloc, and acrylic twin bloc. Equally at home on your vanity, to keep brushes, cosmetics and jewelry organizedThe world of russell+hazel lies at the intersection of color, function and light-heartedness. We have an instantly recognizable style language, developed through colors and patterns that capture the essence of who we are and what we stand for. Our philosophy is that good design is not over-design or design for design’s sake, rather pleasing design with loads of functionality. While fresh in spirit, the products represent a constant and complete dedication to quality.
